snippet: The Australian grain trader GrainCorp said the offer of 11.75 Australian dollars a share from the Archer Daniels Midland Company "materially undervalues" GrainCorp and its prospects.
abstract: The Australian grain trader GrainCorp said the offer of 11.75 Australian dollars a share from the Archer Daniels Midland Company "materially undervalues" GrainCorp and its prospects.
